# [Interview #447: BYU: TGS Midnight Release - Jennifer McBride, Entry #19](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=447#19)

#### Question

Since you are Brown Ajah, will we learn more about the 12 (13) Depositories in the White Tower?

#### Brandon Sanderson

They are mentioned in
*The Gathering Storm*
.
